content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=””][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”remove-margin”][vc_column_text]

CO₂ Laser Accessories

Accu-Beam® CO₂ Micromanipulators, CO₂ Handpieces, and Laparascope couplers.

Our CO₂ accessories are compatible with almost every laser due to the various thread adapters we manufacture. Our Micromanipulators are compatible with almost any microscope or colposcope due to our selection of mounts.

Configurations for ENT, gynecology, dermatology, and more ensure we have the right option for any procedure.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”72494″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” onclick=”link_image”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” padding_top=”” padding_bottom=”” css=”.vc_custom_1444503683289{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e2e2e2″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=”” el_class=”dotted”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569437782001{padding-top: 50px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73345″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/universal-micromanipulator/” css=”.vc_custom_1581356119965{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581517295036{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Universal Micromanipulator

The Accu-Beam® Universal Micromanipulator can work with almost any laser, colposcope, or microscope. It can be configured for both gynecology and ENT.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72497″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/microspot-micromanipulator/” css=”.vc_custom_1574206791731{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581517385851{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Microspot Micromanipulator

The Accu-Beam® Microspot Micromanipulator gets the smallest spot sizes at the longest working distances. It is our best solution for ENT.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72499″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/fixed-focal-handpieces/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364806245{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581517264083{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Fixed Focal Handpieces

The ACCU-BEAM® Fixed Focal Handpieces are straightforward options for tissue incision, coagulation, and ablation. They are available in a variety of focal lengths.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72500″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/variable-handpieces/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364825917{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1575411292965{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Variable Spot Size Handpieces

ACCU-BEAM® Variable Spot Size handpieces include a focus adjustment for the CO₂ beam. There are configurations for gynecology/proctology, ENT, and dermatology.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container” css=”.vc_custom_1569436712252{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569426816312{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”72502″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/co2-laser/laparoscope-couplers/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364848033{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1581517423050{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Laparoscope Couplers

ACCU-Beam® Laparoscope Couplers connect CO₂ laser articulating arms to a variety of operating laparoscopes. They are available in fixed focal and zoom configurations.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1569428939069{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”73349″ img_size=”large” onclick=”custom_link” css_animation=”bottom-to-top” link=”https://www.ttimedical.com/products/fiberoptic-handpieces/” css=”.vc_custom_1581364853800{border-bottom-width: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1570663906781{margin-top: -15px !important;margin-bottom: 20px !important;padding-right: 5px !important;}”]

Fiberoptic Handpieces

Handpieces to be used with contact laser fibers in a wide variety of procedures. Available in rigid or malleable with a range of shapes and sizes.

View more[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
